subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Chris Froome finished second in the Vuelta, but his team, once known for its extraordinary cycling dominance, was 10th out of 18 teams in the International Cycling Union’s points ranking.
snippet: Chris Froome finished second in the Vuelta, but his team, once known for its extraordinary cycling dominance, was 10th out of 18 teams in the International Cycling Union’s points ranking.
